name: v3.0.0-RC1
body:
## :star: New Features

- Use GraphQL Observation instrumentation [#32794](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32794)
- Make consistent use of Property for Gradle task configuration [#32769](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32769)
- When the GraalVM Native Image Gradle plugin is applied, configure bootBuildImage to build a native image [#32768](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32768)
- When the native Maven profile is enabled, configure build-image to build a native image [#32764](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32764)
- Process logback.xml ahead-of-time to allow its configuration to be used in a native image [#32756](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32756)
- When using Brave, auto-configure a CompositeSpanHandler with span exporting predicates, filters, and reporters [#32753](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32753)
- Generate native-image argfile containing reachability metadata excludes for buildpacks to use [#32738](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32738)
- When the GraalVM Native Image Gradle plugin is applied, configure bootJar to contain the output of collectReachabilityMetadata [#32737](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32737)
- Provide maven configuration for native-build-tools reachability metadata goal [#32736](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32736)
-  Log4J2 configuration URLs should respect system settings [#32735](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32735)
- Support profile specific Log4j2 configuration [#32734](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32734)
- Add Log4J2 PropertySource backed by the Spring Environment [#32733](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32733)
- Add Log4j2 StrLookup backed by the Spring Environment [#32732](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32732)
- Add Spring Environment to Log4j2 LoggerContext [#32731](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32731)
- Add support 'log4j.configurationFile' system property [#32730](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32730)
- Relocate `@ConstructorBinding` to bind package and update default behavior  [#32660](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32660)
- Remove spring.webflux.multipart.streaming property [#32658](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32658)
- Auto-configure ProblemDetails support for Spring MVC and Spring WebFlux [#32634](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32634)
- Make auto-configured Brave Tracer more compliant with OTel tracer [#32615](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32615)
- Allow the auto-configured Rabbit Stream Environment to be customized [#32580](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32580)
- Add support for specifying application arguments when application is processed ahead-of-time [#32579](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32579)
- Provide extensions that remove the need for the log4j-spring-boot log4j2 module [#32578](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32578)
- Allow user to replace auto-configured Spring Data JDBC beans with their own [#32571](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32571)
- Remove remaining properties and APIs that were deprecated in Spring Boot 2.x [#32548](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32548)
- Move WebFlux metrics auto-configuration to the new Observation instrumentation [#32539](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32539)
- Move MVC metrics auto-configuration to the new Observation instrumentation [#32538](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32538)
- Prefer WebClient to RestTemplate when creating the Zipkin Sender [#32529](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32529)
- Update WebClient metrics auto-configuration to the new Observation instrumentation [#32518](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32518)
- Require micrometer-tracing-bridge-otel to auto-configure OpenTelemetry [#32503](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32503)
- Require micrometer-tracing-bridge-brave to auto-configure Brave [#32502](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32502)
- Update RestTemplate metrics auto-configuration to the new Observation instrumentation [#32484](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32484)
- MDC & Baggage AutoConfiguration for Micrometer Tracing with Brave and OpenTelemetry [#32480](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32480)
- Allow a Rabbit Stream Environment and Template to be auto-configured when not using a streaming listener container factory [#32477](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32477)
- Adapt to HttpComponentClientHttpRequestFactory changes [#32461](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32461)
- Add auto-configuration for Prometheus Exemplars [#32415](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32415)
- Auto-configure a TracingAwareMeterObservationHandler to make tracing interoperable with metrics [#32399](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32399)
- Add logging at INFO level if AOT is enabled and working [#32396](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32396)
- Output auto-configuration report for context processed ahead-of-time [#32109](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32109)
- Add native-image support for Flyway [#31999](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31999)
- Allow "native" Maven profile to support both NBT and buildpacks [#31770](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31770)
- Change phases of WebServer start-stop and graceful shutdown lifecycles to allow other smart lifecycles to run before graceful shutdown [#31714](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31714)
- Allow ThreadDumpEndpoint to call ThreadMXBean in a native image [#31680](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31680)
- Deprecate server.max-http-header-size in favor of new server.max-http-request-header-size property [#29382](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29382)
- Make the runScripts method on AbstractScriptDatabaseInitializer more extensible [#29137](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29137)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Multi-Document-Separators "#---" comment checks do not account for '!' prefixed comments [#32778](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32778)
- Actuator configprops endpoint does not display DataSize properties correctly [#32776](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32776)
- `@Bean` methods in KafkaAutoConfiguration provide less type information than they could [#32774](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32774)
- PEM formatted elliptic-curve TLS keys are an unrecognized private key format  [#32682](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32682)
- Auto-configuration of ObservationRestTemplateCustomizer fails when micrometer-core is not on the classpath [#32676](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32676)
- Correct configuration of native and AOT-related tasks depends on plugin application order [#32661](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32661)
- ConstructorBinding default detection is considered with a private constructor [#32639](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32639)
- ConfigDataProperties is missing RuntimeHints [#32608](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32608)
- Killing `mvn spring-boot:run` does not kill child process [#32607](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32607)
- Assertion calls on CapturedOutput with Kotlin are very slow [#32576](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32576)
- Classpath scanning of Jackson mixin modules does not work in a native image [#32567](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32567)
- Empty `@DefaultValue` cannot be used on collections, maps, arrays or optional values [#32564](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32564)
- Native tests fail when using `@SpringBootTest` with RANDOM_PORT or DEFINED_PORT [#32542](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32542)
- Use of reflection in AbstractCompositeHealthContributorConfiguration can cause an app using actuator to fail to start in a native image [#32541](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32541)
- WebClient- and RestTemplate-based Zipkin senders can cause a bean dependency cycle [#32528](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32528)
- AOT processing does not work when Devtools is on the classpath [#32517](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32517)
- CouchbaseReactiveHealthIndicator uses blocking API to retrieve the cluster diagnostics [#32514](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32514)
- BootBuildImage's archiveFile property is annotated as an `@Input` but should be annotated as an `@InputFile` [#32500](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32500)
- Response from loggers endpoint is incomplete in a native image [#32486](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32486)
- Logging beans are missing during AOT processing [#32483](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32483)
- EmbeddedLdapContextConfiguration LdapContextSource bean creation not populating base property [#23030](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/23030)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Fix typos in logging.adoc [#32821](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32821)
- Harmonize code sample in the "Type-safe Configuration Properties" section [#32819](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32819)
- Update getting started documentation to use `@SpringBootApplication` [#32780](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32780)
- Check documentation version links [#32772](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32772)
- Add AOT section to Gradle Plugin [#32750](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32750)
- Switch Java version displayed in documentation [#32746](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32746)
- Fix typo "Elastixsearch" [#32656](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32656)
- Add Graal Native documentation [#32582](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32582)
- Add Javadoc since for UseMainMethod [#32568](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32568)
- Provide since and for removal information on `@Deprecated` APIs [#32549](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32549)
- Remove redundant `@ExtendWith`(SpringExtension.class) from MyJmxTests example [#32516](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32516)
- Limit modules in the aggregated javadoc to those that we expect an application to depend upon [#31955](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31955)
- Document management.tracing.enabled property [#31656](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31656)

name: v2.7.5
body:
## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Multi-Document-Separators "#---" comment checks do not account for '!' prefixed comments [#32777](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32777)
- Actuator configprops endpoint does not display DataSize properties correctly [#32775](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32775)
- `@Bean` methods in KafkaAutoConfiguration provide less type information than they could [#32773](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32773)
- PEM formatted elliptic-curve TLS keys are an unrecognized private key format  [#32681](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32681)
- Assertion calls on CapturedOutput with Kotlin are very slow [#32575](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32575)
- Empty `@DefaultValue` cannot be used on collections, maps, arrays or optional values [#32563](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32563)
- CouchbaseReactiveHealthIndicator uses blocking API to retrieve the cluster diagnostics [#32513](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32513)
- BootBuildImage's archiveFile property is annotated as an `@Input` but should be annotated as an `@InputFile` [#32499](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32499)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Remove redundant `@ExtendWith`(SpringExtension.class) from MyJmxTests example [#32515](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32515)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

name: v3.0.0-M5
body:
## :star: New Features

- Update Gradle plugin to skip processAot when there is no main source and to skip processTestAot when there is no test source [#32424](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32424)
- Provide GraalVM metadata repository files in Spring Boot jar built with Gradle [#32408](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32408)
- Configure Batch with the auto-configured PlatformTransactionManager [#32330](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32330)
- Add reflection hints to allow the configured and actual ports to be retrieved when using Undertow in a native image [#32303](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32303)
- Provide a public API for SpringApplication hooks [#32301](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32301)
- Allow application listeners to register additional listeners in early events [#32300](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32300)
- Make EventPublishingRunListener package private [#32299](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32299)
- Remove grab, install, jar, run, uninstall, and war commands from the CLI [#32263](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32263)
- Add NINETEEN to JavaVersion enum [#32261](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32261)
- Remove AnsiColors [#32209](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32209)
- Add support for configuring Spring Session Redis repository [#32205](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32205)
- Add Gradle plugin support for processing test contexts ahead-of-time [#32192](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32192)
- Add Maven plugin support for processing test contexts ahead-of-time [#32191](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32191)
- Refine `ConfigurationPropertiesReflectionHintsProcessor` [#32186](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32186)
- Remove ANTLR 2 dependency management [#32149](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32149)
- Avoid proxy in ValidationAutoConfiguration [#32134](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32134)
- Allow multiple hosts to be set in MongoProperties [#32125](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32125)
- Add native hints for default LDIF file [#32084](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32084)
- Add native-image support for Freemarker [#32052](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32052)
- Add socketKeepAlive configuration property for Elasticsearch [#32051](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32051)
- Simplify Flway auto-configuration by dropping support for older versions [#32036](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32036)
- Remove use of reflection in MustacheViewResolver [#32030](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32030)
- Align default JMX endpoint exposure with default web endpoint exposure [#32005](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32005)
- Add disk space health indicator's path to its details and log message [#31998](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31998)
- Update SpringBootContextLoader to support AOT [#31965](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31965)
- Harmonize AOT goal/task names [#31918](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31918)
- Add native-image support for RestTemplateBuilder [#31888](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31888)
- Remove custom classifier in the native profile in favor of configuring NBT's classesDirectory [#31848](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31848)
- Avoid creating compileAotJava and processAotResources tasks at configuration time [#31844](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31844)
- Reinstate Spring for GraphQL auto-configuration [#31809](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31809)
- Add support for customizing WebJars resource handler path pattern [#31769](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31769)
- Migrate to AuthorizationFilter in Spring Security auto-config [#31255](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31255)
- Support Mongo's Stable API in MongoHealthIndicator [#30849](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30849)
- Reinstate support for Jersey [#28637](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28637)
- Rework HeapDumper strategy interface to be less HotSpot-specific [#27533](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/27533)
- Make it easier to apply customisations to the SpringApplication created by `@SpringBootTest` [#22405](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/22405)
- Update data properties to make it clear which stores do and do not require Spring Data [#11574](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/11574)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Execution optimisations are disabled for generateResourcesConfigFile and nativeCompile [#32465](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32465)
- Tracing and metrics handlers are registered in the wrong order [#32463](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32463)
- Auto-configured DefaultMeterObservationHandler does not back off when the user defines their own MeterObservationHandler [#32462](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32462)
- Generated classes are not available with nativeTest [#32428](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32428)
- Constructor binding of `@ConfigurationProperties` to a Kotlin Data Class with default values doesn't work any more [#32416](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32416)
- DataSource logging in H2 console auto-configuration causes Hikari's threads to have the wrong thread context class loader [#32407](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32407)
- IntelliJ IDEA cannot resolve references to AOT-generated classes in AOT-generated source [#32395](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32395)
- ConnectionFactoryBuilder does not map minIdle [#32332](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32332)
- Generated classes are not available in the compiler's classpath [#32304](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32304)
- Hazelcast auto-configuration recognizes hazelcast.xml and hazelcast.yaml files but not hazelcast.yml [#32248](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32248)
- Hazelcast shutdown logs are not available out-of-the-box [#32246](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32246)
- Detection of PeriodStyle.ISO8601 does not support lower-case input [#32245](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32245)
- Detection of DurationStyle.ISO8601 does not support lower-case input [#32232](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32232)
- YAML timestamps not handled properly with SnakeYaml 1.31 [#32230](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32230)
- Netty 'spring.netty leak detection' default property value is always applied to resource leak detector [#32146](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32146)
- Error "/var/run/docker.sock: connect: permission denied" occurs when building an image using podman on Fedora with SELinux enabled [#32122](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32122)
- Misleading error message when using JarMode Layertools and the source is not an archive [#32098](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32098)
- ClassNotFoundException can be thrown for classes in nested jars when under GC pressure [#32086](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32086)
- Flyway Callbacks and JavaMigrations configured in FlywayConfigurationCustomizer are overwritten by beans of the same type [#32070](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32070)
- BasicJsonParser does not protect against deeply nested maps [#32032](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32032)
- OptionalLiveReloadServer logs the wrong port number when it is configured to use an ephemeral port [#31985](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31985)
- When building with Gradle, transitive runtime dependencies are not available during AOT processing [#31970](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31970)
- Servlet WebServerStartStopLifecycle doesn't set running to false on stop [#31968](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31968)
- JUL-based logging performed during close of application context is lost [#31964](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31964)
- Wrong timeunit for timeouts in Zipkins URLConnectionSender [#31957](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31957)
- WavefrontSenderConfiguration is ineffective [#31954](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31954)
- The hash of spring-boot-jarmode-layertools.jar that's added to a fat jar doesn't match the hash of the equivalent published artifact [#31950](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31950)
- management.endpoint.health.probes.add-additional-paths has no effect when configuration properties have already created the liveness and/or readiness groups [#31927](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31927)
- UnsupportedDataSourcePropertyException is thrown when attempting to set jdbcUrl for C3P0 [#31922](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31922)
- Dev Tools restart failures caused by a too short quiet period are hard to diagnose [#31907](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31907)
- HealthContributor beans managed by a CompositeHealthContributor are recreated on each call [#31880](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31880)
- Dependency management for REST Assured is incomplete [#31878](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31878)
- Jar Handler never clears PROTOCOL_HANDLER system property [#31876](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31876)
- BasicJsonParser can fail with a timeout or stackoverflow with malformed map JSON [#31874](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31874)
- BasicJsonParser can fail with a stackoverflow exception [#31872](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31872)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Document classpath* location for looking up GraphQL schemas across modules [#32471](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32471)
- Document support for JDK 19 [#32403](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32403)
- Clarify documentation of config sub-directory from which external application properties are read [#32292](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32292)
- Remove out-of-date link from auto-configuration documentation [#32217](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32217)
- Clarify documentation on disabling web client request metrics [#32199](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32199)
- Kotlin sample is missing for constructor binding [#32197](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32197)
- Improve `@ConditionalOnClass` javadoc regarding use on `@Bean` methods [#32168](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32168)
- Review Git contribution documentation  [#32100](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32100)
- Documentation for Maven Plugin classifier has an unresolved external reference [#32044](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32044)
- Update Static Content reference documentation to reflect the DefaultServlet no longer being enabled by default [#32027](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32027)
- Example log output is out-of-date and inconsistent [#31988](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31988)
- Document that Undertow's record-request-start-time server option must be enabled for %D to work in access logging [#31977](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31977)
- Update documentation on using H2C to consider running behind a proxy that's performing TLS termination [#31975](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31975)
- Some properties in the Common Application Properties appendix have no description [#31972](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31972)
- Fix links in documentations [#31952](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31952)
- External configuration documentation uses incorrect placeholder syntax [#31944](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31944)
-  server.reactive.session.cookie properties are not listed in the application properties appendix [#31915](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31915)
- Remove documentation and metadata references to ConfigFileApplicationListener [#31902](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31902)
- Metadata for 'spring.beaninfo.ignore' has incorrect SourceType [#31900](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31900)
- Remove reference to nitrite-spring-boot-starter [#31894](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31894)
- Remove reference to Azure Application Insights [#31891](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31891)
- Fix typos in code and documentation [#31866](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31866)

name: v2.7.4
body:
## :star: New Features

- Add NINETEEN to JavaVersion enum [#32260](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32260)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- DataSource logging in H2 console auto-configuration causes Hikari's threads to have the wrong thread context class loader [#32406](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32406)
- Hazelcast auto-configuration recognizes hazelcast.xml and hazelcast.yaml files but not hazelcast.yml [#32247](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32247)
- Detection of PeriodStyle.ISO8601 does not support lower-case input [#32244](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32244)
- Detection of DurationStyle.ISO8601 does not support lower-case input [#32231](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32231)
- YAML timestamps not handled properly with SnakeYaml 1.31 [#32229](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32229)
- Hazelcast shutdown logs are not available out-of-the-box [#32184](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32184)
- Netty 'spring.netty leak detection' default property value is always applied to resource leak detector [#32145](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32145)
- Error "/var/run/docker.sock: connect: permission denied" occurs when building an image using podman on Fedora with SELinux enabled [#32000](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32000)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Document support for JDK 19 [#32402](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32402)
- Clarify documentation of config sub-directory from which external application properties are read [#32291](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32291)
- Clarify documentation on disabling web client request metrics [#32198](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32198)
- Kotlin sample is missing for constructor binding [#32177](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32177)
- Remove out-of-date link from auto-configuration documentation [#32174](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32174)
- Improve `@ConditionalOnClass` javadoc regarding use on `@Bean` methods [#32167](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32167)
- Document classpath* location for looking up GraphQL schemas across modules [#31772](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31772)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to Byte Buddy 1.12.17 [#32454](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32454)
- Upgrade to Couchbase Client 3.3.4 [#32315](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32315)
- Upgrade to Dependency Management Plugin 1.0.14.RELEASE [#32459](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32459)
- Upgrade to Dropwizard Metrics 4.2.12 [#32316](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32316)

name: v2.6.12
body:
## :star: New Features

- Add NINETEEN to JavaVersion enum [#32226](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32226)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- DataSource logging in H2 console auto-configuration causes Hikari's threads to have the wrong thread context class loader [#32382](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32382)
- Detection of PeriodStyle.ISO8601 does not support lower-case input [#32235](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32235)
- YAML timestamps not handled properly with SnakeYaml 1.31 [#32228](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32228)
- Detection of DurationStyle.ISO8601 does not support lower-case input [#32223](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32223)
- Netty 'spring.netty leak detection' default property value is always applied to resource leak detector [#32144](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32144)
- Hazelcast auto-configuration recognizes hazelcast.xml and hazelcast.yaml files but not hazelcast.yml [#32142](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/32142)

name: v2.7.3
body:
## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Misleading error message when using JarMode Layertools and the source is not an archive [#32097](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32097)
- ClassNotFoundException can be thrown for classes in nested jars when under GC pressure [#32085](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32085)
- Flyway auto-configuration fails with Flyway 9 [#32034](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32034)
- BasicJsonParser does not protect against deeply nested maps [#32031](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32031)
- OptionalLiveReloadServer logs the wrong port number when it is configured to use an ephemeral port [#31984](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31984)
- Servlet WebServerStartStopLifecycle doesn't set running to false on stop [#31967](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31967)
- JUL-based logging performed during close of application context is lost [#31963](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31963)
- The hash of spring-boot-jarmode-layertools.jar that's added to a fat jar doesn't match the hash of the equivalent published artifact [#31949](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31949)
- management.endpoint.health.probes.add-additional-paths has no effect when configuration properties have already created the liveness and/or readiness groups [#31926](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31926)
- UnsupportedDataSourcePropertyException is thrown when attempting to set jdbcUrl for C3P0 [#31921](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31921)
- Dev Tools restart failures caused by a too short quiet period are hard to diagnose [#31906](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31906)
- HealthContributor beans managed by a CompositeHealthContributor are recreated on each call [#31879](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31879)
- Dependency management for REST Assured is incomplete [#31877](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31877)
- Jar Handler never clears PROTOCOL_HANDLER system property [#31875](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31875)
- BasicJsonParser can fail with a timeout or stackoverflow with malformed map JSON [#31873](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31873)
- BasicJsonParser can fail with a stackoverflow exception [#31871](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31871)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Review Git contribution documentation  [#32099](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32099)
- Documentation for Maven Plugin classifier has an unresolved external reference [#32043](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32043)
- Update Static Content reference documentation to reflect the DefaultServlet no longer being enabled by default [#32026](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32026)
- Example log output is out-of-date and inconsistent [#31987](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31987)
- Document that Undertow's record-request-start-time server option must be enabled for %D to work in access logging [#31976](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31976)
- Update documentation on using H2C to consider running behind a proxy that's performing TLS termination [#31974](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31974)
- Some properties in the Common Application Properties appendix have no description [#31971](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31971)
- Fix links in documentations [#31951](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31951)
- External configuration documentation uses incorrect placeholder syntax [#31943](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31943)
-  server.reactive.session.cookie properties are not listed in the application properties appendix [#31914](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31914)
- Remove documentation and metadata references to ConfigFileApplicationListener [#31901](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31901)
- Metadata for 'spring.beaninfo.ignore' has incorrect SourceType [#31899](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31899)
- Remove reference to nitrite-spring-boot-starter [#31893](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31893)
- Remove reference to Azure Application Insights [#31890](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31890)
- Fix typos in code and documentation [#31865](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31865)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to Byte Buddy 1.12.13 [#32013](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/32013)

name: v3.0.0-M4
body:
## :star: New Features

- Auto-configure Spring Data's new ReactiveElasticsearchClient in place of the old one [#31755](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31755)
- Add auto-configuration for JdkClientHttpConnector [#31709](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31709)
- Drop support for String path matching for MVC endpoint handler mappings [#31700](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31700)
- Enable GraalVM reachability metadata repository [#31687](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31687)
- Add config property for KafkaAdmin modifyTopicConfigs [#31679](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31679)
- Reinstate support for Hibernate metrics [#31675](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31675)
- AOT support for Actuator [#31671](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31671)
- Upgrade to Spring REST Docs 3.0.0-M4 [#31621](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31621)
- Support deriving a DataSourceBuilder from a wrapped DataSource [#31605](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31605)
- Add a configuration property for the trusted proxies of Tomcat's Remote IP valve [#31576](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31576)
- Remove --allow-incomplete-classpath from native-image arguments [#31568](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31568)
- Adapt to change in default strategy for URL path matching in Spring MVC [#31547](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31547)
- Allow Jackson's lazily created standard JDK serializers to be used in a native image [#31537](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31537)
- Add support for property binding in SpringApplication when running in native-image [#31534](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31534)
- Add resource hints for schema and data scripts [#31533](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31533)
- Add native-image support for JavaLoggingSystem [#31531](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31531)
- Allow HTTP message converters to be auto-configured in a native image that is not a web app [#31528](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31528)
- Remove YamlJsonParser [#31498](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31498)
- Raise the minimum supported version of Kotlin to 1.7 [#31391](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31391)
- Add PropertyMapper.to(...) API designed for immutable instances [#31323](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31323)
- Do not auto-configure a ReactiveUserDetailsService when an AuthenticationManagerResolver bean is present [#31317](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31317)
- Add resource hints for application properties [#31311](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31311)
- Add resource hints for default templates location [#31310](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31310)
- Disable tracing in integration tests [#31308](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31308)
- Add Runnable variant of TestPropertyValues.applyToSystemProperties [#31303](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31303)
- Add a method to ApplicationContextRunner that prepares but does not refresh the context [#31302](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31302)
- Apply initializers and bean registrations before registering classes in ApplicationContextRunner [#31280](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31280)
- Add resource hints for serving static web content [#31278](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31278)
- Add AOT support for immutable configuration properties [#31247](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31247)
- Register runtime hints for `@ConfigurationProperties` annotation [#31227](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31227)
- Raise the minimum supported version of Gradle to 7.5 [#31215](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31215)
- Remove redundant throws declarations from public APIs [#31179](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31179)
- Support management contexts with AOT [#31163](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31163)
- Auto-configure JvmCompilationMetrics [#31151](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31151)
- Allow Prometheus PushGateway to be configured to perform a PUT on shutdown [#31104](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31104)
- Add WebClient based sender for Zipkin [#30792](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30792)
- Remove support for Elasticsearch's RestHighLevelClient [#30647](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30647)
- Support new ElasticsearchClient [#28597](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28597)
- Move auto-configuration for reactive Elasticsearch client into o.s.b.autoconfigure.elasticsearch [#28068](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28068)
- Allow configuring WebDriver with TestNG [#27947](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/27947)
- Remove spring.session.store-type in favor of a defined order for which implementation will win when multiple are available [#27756](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/27756)
- Remove support for running multiple Spring Batch jobs [#25373](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/25373)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Publishing a docker image to a private registry fails without authentication [#31825](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31825)
- In a non-reactive application, health indicators in a parent context are not found [#31819](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31819)
- Dependency management for Derby is incomplete [#31815](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31815)
- A router function with attributes causes /actuator/mappings to return a 500 response due to an UnsupportedOperationException [#31807](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31807)
- InstanceAlreadyExistsException when using Actuator with multiple context and JMX enabled [#31805](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31805)
- A project dependency on a Java library does not make the library's resources visible to AOT source generation [#31803](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31803)
-  Using 'ImportAutoConfigurationImportSelector' in the jar package loaded by a custom class loader throws ClassNotFoundException [#31802](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31802)
- Trailing whitespace in the value of a property is hard to identify in failure analysis descriptions [#31781](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31781)
- Log4j2's shutdown hook is not disabled when using Log4j 2.18 or later [#31733](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31733)
- spring-boot-starter-jetty does not use the official Jakarta Servlet and WebSocket APIs [#31720](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31720)
- HTTP Server and Data repositories metrics record null for the description [#31707](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31707)
- Deprecation hint for spring.data.mongodb.grid-fs-database is located in the wrong section [#31691](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31691)
- Image building fails with latest Paketo base builder and additional buildpacks configured [#31559](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31559)
- Tomcat fails to start when PEM files are used and key-store-password is not specified [#31529](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31529)
- Values in a spring.data.cassandra.config file can't override some defaults defined in CassandraProperties [#31504](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31504)
- `@RestControllerAdvice` `@ExceptionHandler` Inconsistent behavior with `@RestControllerEndpoint` [#31502](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31502)
- Malformed json causes BasicJsonParser to throw a NullPointerException [#31500](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31500)
- Metadata generated by the configuration properties annotation processor can miss inherited properties from nested classes [#31485](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31485)
- OAuth2 Resource Server Auto-Configuration can only configure a single JWS algorithm [#31404](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31404)
- JarFile implementation calls close early which breaks verification of signed unpacked nested jars on Oracle JDK [#31396](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31396)
- Health indicators that take a long time to respond are difficult to diagnose [#31385](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31385)
- Maven shade plugin configuration in spring-boot-starter-parent does not append META-INF/spring/*.imports files [#31368](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31368)
- ZipkinConfigurations.SenderConfiguration uses `@ConditionalOnClass` on a `@Bean` method [#31353](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31353)
- Custom Converter annotated with `@ConfigurationPropertiesBinding` does not get selected if targetType has a static factory method different return type [#31342](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31342)
- Zipkin auto-configuration should not back off on custom SpanHandler [#31273](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31273)
- Micrometer tracing auto-configuration doesn't register all ObservationHandlers [#31272](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31272)
- spring-boot-dependencies manages spring-ldap-ldif-batch which no longer exists [#31256](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31256)
- ConfigurationPropertiesBeanFactoryInitializationAotProcessor does not handle singleton [#31248](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31248)
- When building with Maven, classes generated by AOT are not included in final artifact [#31245](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31245)
- Base packages are not contributed with AOT [#31223](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31223)
- Prevent `main` method to continue once the AOT context has been optimized [#31219](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31219)
- Dependency task can fail due to BootJar and BootWar afterResolve hooks [#31214](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31214)
- spring-configuration-metadata.json is missing for additional-spring-configuration-metadata.json after switching from `@Configuration` to `@AutoConfiguration` [#31191](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31191)
- MimeMappings does not include application/wasm [#31189](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31189)
- Dependency management for mimepull is redundant and the managed version is incompatible with Java 8 [#31187](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31187)
- Binder(ConfigurationPropertySource... sources) does not assert that sources contains only non-null elements [#31184](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31184)
- WebMvcMetricsFilter stopped working since 2.7.0 [#31152](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31152)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Clarify how docker image publishing registry is determined  [#31827](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31827)
- Fix deprecations in javadocs [#31713](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31713)
- Remove Jolokia references from the documentation [#31549](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31549)
- Make SpringApplication Kotlin samples idiomatic [#31466](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31466)
- Harmonize Kotlin example [#31461](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31461)
- Remove duplicate content from "The Spring WebFlux Framework" section [#31382](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31382)
- Document that property placeholders should use the canonical property name form [#31370](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31370)
- Fix typos in the reference documentation [#31367](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31367)
- Enable Links for the Javadoc of the Gradle Plugin [#31363](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31363)
- Remove "earlier in this chapter" from places where content is now elsewhere in the documentation [#31361](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31361)
- Restore custom favicon documentation [#31359](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31359)
- Document that when using Lombok it must be configured to run before spring-boot-configuration-processor [#31357](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31357)
- Use Lambda-based API in Spring Security examples [#31355](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31355)
- Fix typo in name of imports file in javadoc of ImportCandidates.from [#31340](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31340)
- Update Dynatrace Micrometer registry documentation [#31339](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31339)
- Typos in documentation ("spring-factories" instead of "spring.factories")  [#31207](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31207)
- Fix Custom Layers Configuration section title in Maven plugin docs [#31181](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31181)
- Add link to 'Error Handling Spring Boot Starter' [#31156](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31156)

name: v2.7.2
body:
## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Publishing a docker image to a private registry fails without authentication [#31824](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31824)
- In a non-reactive application, health indicators in a parent context are not found [#31818](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31818)
- Dependency management for Derby is incomplete [#31814](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31814)
- ApplicationPid doesn't log a warning if it takes a long time to return [#31810](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31810)
- A router function with attributes causes /actuator/mappings to return a 500 response due to an UnsupportedOperationException [#31806](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31806)
- InstanceAlreadyExistsException when using Actuator with multiple context and JMX enabled [#31804](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31804)
-  Using 'ImportAutoConfigurationImportSelector' in the jar package loaded by a custom class loader throws ClassNotFoundException [#31801](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31801)
- GraphQL auto-configuration does not configure the GrapQlSource with SubscriptionExceptionResolver beans [#31794](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31794)
- Trailing whitespace in the value of a property is hard to identify in failure analysis descriptions [#31780](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31780)
- Log4j2's shutdown hook is not disabled when using Log4j 2.18 or later [#31732](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31732)
- HTTP Server and Data repositories metrics record null for the description [#31706](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31706)
- Deprecation hint for spring.data.mongodb.grid-fs-database is located in the wrong section [#31690](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31690)
- Image building fails with latest Paketo base builder and additional buildpacks configured [#31558](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31558)
- Tomcat fails to start when PEM files are used and key-store-password is not specified [#31253](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31253)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Clarify how docker image publishing registry is determined  [#31826](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31826)
- Fix typo in "HTTP and WebSocket" section of GraphQL documentation [#31518](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31518)

name: v2.7.1
body:
## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Values in a spring.data.cassandra.config file can't override some defaults defined in CassandraProperties [#31503](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31503)
- `@RestControllerAdvice` `@ExceptionHandler` Inconsistent behavior with `@RestControllerEndpoint` [#31501](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31501)
- Malformed json causes BasicJsonParser to throw a NullPointerException [#31499](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31499)
- Metadata generated by the configuration properties annotation processor can miss inherited properties from nested classes [#31484](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31484)
- JarFile implementation calls close early which breaks verification of signed unpacked nested jars on Oracle JDK [#31395](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31395)
- Health indicators that take a long time to respond are difficult to diagnose [#31384](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31384)
- Custom Converter annotated with `@ConfigurationPropertiesBinding` does not get selected if targetType has a static factory method different return type [#31341](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31341)
- Tomcat server.max-http-header-size property is ignored when using HTTP/2 [#31329](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31329)
- OAuth2 Resource Server Auto-Configuration can only configure a single JWS algorithm [#31321](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31321)
- Maven shade plugin configuration in spring-boot-starter-parent does not append META-INF/spring/*.imports files [#31316](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31316)
- GraphQL RouterFunctions are unordered which prevents other functions from being ordered after them [#31314](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31314)
- spring-boot-dependencies manages spring-ldap-ldif-batch which no longer exists [#31254](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31254)
- Dependency task can fail due to BootJar and BootWar afterResolve hooks [#31213](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31213)
- MimeMappings does not include application/wasm [#31188](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31188)
- spring-configuration-metadata.json is missing for additional-spring-configuration-metadata.json after switching from `@Configuration` to `@AutoConfiguration` [#31186](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31186)
- Binder(ConfigurationPropertySource... sources) does not assert that sources contains only non-null elements [#31183](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31183)
- WebMvcMetricsFilter stopped working since 2.7.0 [#31150](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31150)
- Dependency management for mimepull is redundant and the managed version is incompatible with Java 8 [#31145](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31145)
- layers.xsd is out of sync with the documentation and implementation for including and excluding module dependencies [#31128](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31128)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Make SpringApplication Kotlin samples idiomatic [#31463](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31463)
- Harmonize Kotlin example [#31458](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31458)
- Remove duplicate content from "The Spring WebFlux Framework" section [#31381](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31381)
- Document that property placeholders should use the canonical property name form [#31369](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31369)
- Fix typos in the reference documentation [#31366](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31366)
- Enable Links for the Javadoc of the Gradle Plugin [#31362](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31362)
- Remove "earlier in this chapter" from places where content is now elsewhere in the documentation [#31360](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31360)
- Restore custom favicon documentation [#31358](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31358)
- Document that when using Lombok it must be configured to run before spring-boot-configuration-processor [#31356](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31356)
- Use Lambda-based API in Spring Security examples [#31354](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31354)
- Fix typo in name of imports file in javadoc of ImportCandidates.from [#31277](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31277)
- Typos in documentation ("spring-factories" instead of "spring.factories")  [#31206](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31206)
- Fix Custom Layers Configuration section title in Maven plugin docs [#31180](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31180)
- org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.metrics.graphql has no package info [#31140](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31140)
- Update Dynatrace Micrometer registry documentation [#31132](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31132)

name: v3.0.0-M3
body:
## :star: New Features

- Remove auto-configuration for Apache Solr until it is compatible with Jetty 11 [#31054](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31054)
- Allow basic usage of Logback in applications compiled to a native image [#30975](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30975)
- Update started log message to reflect that the application may not be running on the JVM [#30974](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30974)
- Use AOT-generated context initialization when running in a native image [#30915](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30915)
- Reinstate support for pooled-jms as it is now JMS 3.0 compatible [#30865](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30865)
- Remove support for Embedded Mongo in favour of its new built-in Spring Boot support [#30863](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30863)
- Add a profile to spring-boot-starter-parent for building a native image from an application [#30830](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30830)
- Add `OtlpMeterRegistry` auto-configuration [#30825](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30825)
- Auto-configure Micrometer's JVM info metrics [#30823](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30823)
- Auto-configure http tracing for Micrometer Tracing [#30784](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30784)
- Provide a configuration property for Kafka's async acks [#30776](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30776)
- Remove deprecated properties in Saml2RelyingPartyProperties [#30751](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30751)
- Remove dependency management for AppEngine SDK [#30638](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30638)
- Integrate AOT generation in Spring Boot Gradle Plugin [#30527](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30527)
- Integrate AOT generation in Spring Boot Maven Plugin [#30525](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30525)
- Remove the ability to run an application in the Maven process [#30501](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30501)
- Simplify main class name resolution in Gradle projects [#30467](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30467)
- Move metrics export properties [#30381](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30381)
- Add support for Micrometer tracing [#30156](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30156)
- Use Log4jBridgeHandler to route JUL-based logging into Log4j 2 [#30003](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30003)
- Add auto-configuration for Micrometer 2.0 Observation API [#29666](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29666)
- Reinstate support for REST Assured [#29543](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29543)
- Provide a callback mechanism for customizing LocalValidatorFactoryBean's configuration [#29429](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29429)
- To fully align with ISO-8601, use yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX as the default logging date format [#28654](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28654)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- App fails to start when it depends on thymeleaf-extras-springsecurity6 but does not have Spring Security on the classpath [#31033](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/31033)
- BatchDataSourceScriptDatabaseInitializer does not find the Oracle schema scripts [#30564](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30564)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Fix references to JDK 1.8 in READMEs [#30447](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30447)
- Manual metadata has an outdated reference to spring.datasource.initialization-mode [#30435](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30435)

- Upgrade to Artemis 2.22.0 [#30943](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30943)

name: v2.7.0
body:
See the [Release notes for 2.7](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/wiki/Spring-Boot-2.7-Release-Notes) for upgrade instructions and details of new features.

## :star: New Features

- Revert to using "application/json" as default MIME type for GraphQL while remaining compatible with "application/graphql+json" [#30860](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30860)
- Allow customization of single logout in auto-configured SAML relying party registration [#30128](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30128)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Default properties configured on SpringApplication have higher precedence than properties configured with `@PropertySource` [#31093](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31093)
- A failure when an instrumented WebClient records metrics causes the request to fail [#31089](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31089)
- Dependency management for Artemis is incomplete [#31079](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31079)
- Configuration properties for Statsd's buffered and step properties are missing [#31059](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/31059)
- Debug logging for requests to WebFlux-based Actuator endpoints does not identify the endpoint [#30887](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30887)
- `@ConditionalOnProperty` meta annotation with `@AliasFor` does not work [#30874](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30874)
- Event handling in JobExecutionExitCodeGenerator is not thread-safe [#30846](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30846)
- Hibernate service loading logs HHH000505 warnings for ServiceConfigurationError with Gradle-built jars since 2.5.10 when using Java 11 or later [#30791](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30791)
- Cryptic startup failure with bare LOGGING_LEVEL environment variable [#30789](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30789)
- SearchStrategy argument of MethodValidationExcludeFilter byAnnotation(Class, SearchStrategy) is not used [#30787](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30787)
- spring.security.saml2.relyingparty.registration.*.asserting-party.* properties contain unwanted hyphen in asserting-party [#30785](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30785)
- DevTools sets deprecated spring.mustache.cache property [#30774](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30774)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Extend documentation on Datadog metrics [#30997](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30997)
- Fix link to Upgrading From 1.x in multi-page documentation [#30995](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30995)
- Document support for Java 18 [#30782](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30782)

name: v2.7.0-RC1
body:
## :star: New Features

- Use auto-configured JSON codecs in GraphQlTesterAutoConfiguration [#30646](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30646)
- Change identityprovider to assertingparty in Saml2RelyingPartyProperties [#30642](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30642)
- Update initialization of WebSocket handler in GraphQlWebMvcAutoConfiguration [#30641](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30641)
- Allow disabling the Dynatrace instruments in Micrometer [#30637](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30637)
- Make ServletWebServerFactory and ReactiveWebServerFactory extend the WebServerFactory marker interface [#30579](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30579)
- Add support for CNB platform API 0.9 [#30566](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30566)
- Align tag and metric names with Micrometer?s recommendations [#30536](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30536)
- Deprecate running an application in the Maven process [#30479](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30479)
- Add support for Prometheus Exemplars [#30472](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30472)
- Support Ordered and `@Order` for exit code generation [#30457](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30457)
- Configure RSocket support in GraphQL [#30453](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30453)
- Support "application/graphql+json" media type in GraphQL HTTP mapping [#30407](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30407)
- Perform failure analysis when a web application cannot be started due to a missing web server factory bean [#30358](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30358)
- Simplify registration of Jackson mixin types [#30152](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30152)
- Deprecate DatabaseDriver.GAE [#29984](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29984)
- Add auto-configuration for Kafka Retry Topics [#29812](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29812)
- Relocate `@Local`*Port to spring-boot-test [#29589](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29589)
- Move core Maven artifacts to the provided scope for the maven plugin [#29520](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29520)
- Provide autoconfiguration to enable TLS for Web Server using PEM files instead of Keystore [#29273](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29273)
- Validate the aud claim in OAuth2 resource server [#29084](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29084)
- Deprecate Elasticsearch RestHighLevelClient [#28598](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28598)
- Support Elasticsearch RestClientBuilder auto-configuration without RestHighLevelClient [#28496](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/28496)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- bootBuildInfo fails with a NullPointerException when an additional property has a null value [#30671](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30671)
- `@SpringBootTest`(webEnvironment = WebEnvironment.NONE) is overridden by spring.main.web-application-type in application.properties [#30667](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30667)
- Spring Boot does not respect WebApplicationType.REACTIVE in tests with a mock web environment [#30665](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30665)
- NullPointerException is thrown when accessing /actuator/configprops if a class annotated with both `@Configuration` and `@ConfigurationProperties` has a static `@Bean` method [#30582](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30582)
- ApplicationAvailabilityBean is not thread-safe [#30554](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30554)
- Incorrect Neo4j username property replacement hint by spring-boot-properties-migrator [#30552](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30552)
- Add Tomcat locale mapping for Japanese to preserve UTF-8 charset [#30542](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30542)
- MustacheAutoConfiguration in a Servlet web application fails with a ClassNotFoundException when Spring MVC is not on the classpath [#30476](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30476)
- DataSource metrics are not auto-configured when using lazy initialization [#30282](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30282)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Update doc samples to reflect AdoptOpenJDK move to the Eclipse Foundation [#30750](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30750)
- Fix incorrect link in kafka.adoc [#30740](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30740)
- Move Jetty 9 specific exclusions to the correct dependency [#30584](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30584)
- Add missing configuration metadata for "management.endpoint.health.probes.add-additional-paths" [#30573](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30573)
- Update list of default internal proxies in Web Server howto [#30545](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30545)
- Polish documentation [#30528](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30528)
- Javadoc of org.springframework.boot.gradle.plugin.ResolveMainClassName.setClasspath(Object) is inaccurate [#30470](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30470)
- Document that `@DefaultValue` can be used on a record component [#30466](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30466)
- Remove redundant Javadoc [#30450](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30450)
- Move JsonComponent documentation from Spring MVC to general Jackson section [#30405](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30405)

name: v2.6.7
body:
## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- bootBuildInfo fails with a NullPointerException when an additional property has a null value [#30670](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30670)
- `@SpringBootTest`(webEnvironment = WebEnvironment.NONE) is overridden by spring.main.web-application-type in application.properties [#30666](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30666)
- Spring Boot does not respect WebApplicationType.REACTIVE in tests with a mock web environment [#30664](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30664)
- NullPointerException is thrown when accessing /actuator/configprops if a class annotated with both `@Configuration` and `@ConfigurationProperties` has a static `@Bean` method [#30581](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30581)
- ApplicationAvailabilityBean is not thread-safe [#30553](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30553)
- Incorrect Neo4j username property replacement hint by spring-boot-properties-migrator [#30551](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30551)
- Add Tomcat locale mapping for Japanese to preserve UTF-8 charset [#30541](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30541)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Update doc samples to reflect AdoptOpenJDK move to the Eclipse Foundation [#30749](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30749)

- Move Jetty 9 specific exclusions to the correct dependency [#30583](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30583)
- Add missing configuration metadata for "management.endpoint.health.probes.add-additional-paths" [#30562](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30562)

name: v3.0.0-M2
body:
## :star: New Features

- Reinstate support for Ehcache 3 [#30002](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30002)
- Reinstate support for H2 Console [#29755](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29755)
- Raise the minimum supported version of Gradle to 7.4 [#29674](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29674)
- Raise the minimum supported version of Kotlin to 1.6 [#29660](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29660)
- Remove values from JavaVersion enum for Java versions less than 17 [#29503](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29503)
- Remove image banner support [#28883](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28883)
- Provide dependency management for RxJava 3 in place of 1.x and 2.x [#28212](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28212)
- Allow `@ConstructorBinding` to be optional [#23216](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/23216)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- spring-boot-dependencies contains dependency management for spring-boot-starter-jta-atomikos which no longer exists [#29653](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29653)
- spring-boot-dependencies contains dependency management for spring-boot-starter-activemq which no longer exists [#29645](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29645)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Update documentation about Spock to reflect Groovy 4.0 requirement [#30318](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30318)
- Add reference to Casdoor Spring Boot Starter [#30220](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30220)
- Document that the minimum supported version of Kotlin is now 1.6 [#30197](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30197)
