name: v2.7.0-M3
body:
## :star: New Features

- Align indices options of auto-configured ReactiveElasticsearchTemplate with Spring Data Elasticsearch's default [#30378](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30378)
- Rework spring.mustache properties to make it clear which are Servlet-specific [#30273](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30273)
- Remove support for spring.mongodb.embedded.features [#30219](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30219)
- Support podman for building images [#30196](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30196)
- Add EIGHTEEN to JavaVersion enum [#30133](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30133)
- Allow spring.data.mongodb.uri to override separate host, port, etc properties [#30067](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30067)
- Refine GraphQL server auto-configuration [#30035](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30035)
- Support overriding the default key-based sanitization [#30006](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30006)
- Configure FormattingConversionService in GraphQlAutoConfiguration [#29638](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29638)
- Add option to pass configured Docker host to the image builder container [#29384](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29384)
- Add configuration property for supported media types with reactive Mustache views [#28858](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28858)
- Add support for cache2k in memory caching [#28498](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/28498)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- ConfigurationPropertyName#equals is not symmetric when adapt has removed trailing characters from an element [#30393](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30393)
- Thymeleaf auto-configuration in a reactive application can fail due to duplicate templateEngine beans [#30386](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30386)
- server.tomcat.keep-alive-timeout is not applied to HTTP/2 [#30322](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30322)
- Setting spring.mustache.enabled to false has no effect [#30257](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30257)
- bootWar is configured eagerly [#30215](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30215)
- Actuator `@ReadOperation` on Flux cancels request after first element emitted [#30162](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30162)
- Unnecessary allocations in Prometheus scraping endpoint [#30126](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30126)
- No metrics are bound for R2DBC ConnectionPools that have been wrapped [#30101](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30101)
- Condition evaluation report entry for a `@ConditionalOnSingleCandidate` that does not match due to multiple primary beans isn't as clear as it could be [#30099](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30099)
- DataFetcherExceptionResolver beans are not considered in GraphQlTester slice tests [#30078](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/30078)
- Generated password are logged without an "unsuitable for production use" note [#30071](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30071)
- Files in META-INF are not found when deploying a Gradle-built executable war to a servlet container [#30037](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30037)
- Dependency management for Apache Kafka is incomplete [#30032](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30032)
- spring-boot-configuration-processor fails compilation due to `@DefaultValue` with a long value and generates invalid metadata for byte and short properties with out-of-range default values [#30023](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30023)
- Naming strategy and MBean exporter are configured inconsistently in JmxAutoConfiguration [#29968](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29968)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Add Apache Kafka to the description of the Messaging section [#30394](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30394)
- Default value of spring.thymeleaf.reactive.media-types is not documented [#30388](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30388)
- Clarify type matching that is performed when using `@MockBean` and `@SpyBean` [#30383](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30383)
- Fix links to Spring Security Reference Guide in Accessing the H2 Console in a Secured Application [#30380](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30380)
- Document how to access the H2 Console in a secured web application [#30347](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30347)
- Add Netty in "Enable HTTP Response Compression"  [#30345](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30345)
- Fix JsonSerializer example in reference guide [#30331](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30331)
- WebSockets section missing in reference guide [#30275](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30275)
- Include default Dev Tools properties in the reference documentation [#30167](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30167)
- Document the WebSocket-related exclusions that are required to use Jetty 10 [#30150](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30150)
- Fix typo [#30121](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30121)
- Anchor tag for Spring HATEOAS does not redirect properly [#30119](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30119)
- Add documentation for spring.profiles.include [#30116](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30116)
- Document when config data properties are invalid [#30115](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30115)
- Document the scalar types supported by MapBinder [#30112](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30112)
- Document how to rely on ServletContext with an embedded container setup [#30110](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30110)
- Clarify that build plugins or the CLI does not have an auto-compile feature [#30094](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30094)
- Document how to structure configurations so that `@Bean` methods are included in slice tests [#30092](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30092)
- Remove non-existent spring.data.cassandra.connection.connection-timeout property from the documentation [#30081](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30081)
- Use Gradle's task configuration avoidance APIs in the main reference docs [#30060](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30060)
- Use Gradle's task configuration avoidance APIs in the Gradle Plugin's reference docs [#30058](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30058)
- Document plugging in custom sanitisation rules with a SanitizingFunction bean [#30054](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30054)
- Improve property placeholder documentation to mention environment variables and default values [#30051](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30051)
- Polish web examples in reference doc [#30049](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30049)
- Add links to Spring Boot for Apache Geode to the reference documentation [#30019](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30019)

name: v2.6.5
body:
## :mega: Noteworthy

- This release upgrades to Kafka 3.0.1 which enables idempotence by default. See [the updated Spring Boot 2.6 release notes](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/wiki/Spring-Boot-2.6-Release-Notes#kafka-30) for further details.

## :star: New Features

- Add EIGHTEEN to JavaVersion enum [#30132](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30132)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- ConfigurationPropertyName#equals is not symmetric when adapt has removed trailing characters from an element [#30392](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30392)

- Setting spring.mustache.enabled to false has no effect [#30256](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30256)
- bootWar is configured eagerly [#30213](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30213)
- Actuator `@ReadOperation` on Flux cancels request after first element emitted [#30161](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30161)
- Unnecessary allocations in Prometheus scraping endpoint [#30125](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30125)
- No metrics are bound for R2DBC ConnectionPools that have been wrapped [#30100](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30100)
- Condition evaluation report entry for a `@ConditionalOnSingleCandidate` that does not match due to multiple primary beans isn't as clear as it could be [#30098](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30098)
- Generated password are logged without an "unsuitable for production use" note [#30070](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30070)
- Dependency management for Netty tcNative is incomplete leading to possible version conflicts [#30038](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30038)
- Files in META-INF are not found when deploying a Gradle-built executable war to a servlet container [#30036](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30036)
- Dependency management for Apache Kafka is incomplete [#30031](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30031)
- spring-boot-configuration-processor fails compilation due to `@DefaultValue` with a long value and generates invalid metadata for byte and short properties with out-of-range default values [#30022](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30022)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Add Apache Kafka to the description of the Messaging section [#30389](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30389)

- Add Netty in "Enable HTTP Response Compression"  [#30344](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30344)
- Fix JsonSerializer example in reference guide [#30330](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30330)
- WebSockets section missing in reference guide [#30231](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30231)
- Include default Dev Tools properties in the reference documentation [#30166](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30166)
- Document the WebSocket-related exclusions that are required to use Jetty 10 [#30149](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30149)
- Fix typo [#30120](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30120)
- Add documentation for spring.profiles.include [#30114](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30114)
- Document when config data properties are invalid [#30113](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30113)
- Document the scalar types supported by MapBinder [#30111](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30111)

- Remove non-existent spring.data.cassandra.connection.connection-timeout property from the documentation [#30080](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/30080)

name: v2.7.0-M2
body:
## :star: New Features

- Add DataCouchbaseTest annotation [#29912](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29912)
- Add DataElasticsearchTest annotation [#29911](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29911)
- Allow relative auto-configuration ordering to be configured using `@AutoConfiguration` [#29907](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29907)
- Add Kafka immediateStop Property [#29884](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29884)
- Move away from spring.factories for auto-configurations [#29872](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29872)
- Introduce `@AutoConfiguration` [#29870](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29870)
- Remove separate dependency management for netty-tcnative in favor of the entry in Netty’s bom [#29816](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29816)
- Support constructor injection for FailureAnalyzers [#29811](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29811)
- Move away from spring.factories for management context configuration imports [#29730](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29730)
- Add redis sentinel username support for authentication with ACL [#29661](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29661)
- Adapt OpaqueTokenIntrospector auto-configuration so that Nimbus is no longer required [#29572](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29572)
- Implement InputStream.available() for RandomAccessDataFile-backed input streams [#29295](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29295)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Default JmxAutoConfiguration changes JConsole hierarchy for multi-property `@ManagedResource` object names [#29971](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29971)
- GraphQlService may not used contributed BatchLoaderRegistry [#29929](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29929)
- The active profiles log message is ambiguous when a profile's name contains a comma [#29916](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29916)
- `@SpyBean` causes BeanCurrentlyInCreationException when there are circular references [#29910](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29910)
- Failed application contexts are not deregistered from SpringApplicationShutdownHook [#29906](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29906)
- Gradle Plugin triggers eager configuration of some tasks [#29818](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29818)
- MimeMapping for ots has a trailing space in its mime type [#29751](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29751)
- A fat jar built with Gradle moves META-INF beneath BOOT-INF/classes while Maven leaves it at the jar's root [#29749](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29749)
- WebSessionIdResolverAutoConfiguration should only be active in a reactive web application [#29744](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29744)
- Dependency management for Liquibase does not include its liquibase-cdi module [#29742](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29742)
- server.tomcat.use-relative-redirects=true not honored when server.forward-headers-strategy=framework [#29732](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29732)
- Ignore invalid stream types when reading log update events [#29692](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29692)
- bootJar, bootRun, and bootWar do not pick up changes to the main source set's runtime classpath that are made after Boot's plugin has been applied [#29680](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29680)
- Health Web Endpoint Extension Failed to Initialize When Some Conditions Hit [#29584](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29584)
-  ErrorPageSecurityFilter cannot be destroyed in a Servlet 3.1 compatible container [#29565](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29565)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Document that placeholders in `@DefaultValue` annotations are not resolved [#29981](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29981)
- Clarify relation of import path to resultant properties in configtree import data [#29979](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29979)
- bootRun example should use mainClass, rather than main which was deprecated in Gradle 7.1 [#29967](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29967)
- Rectify incorrect sanitizing regex example provided in how-to docs [#29960](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29960)
- "Customizing the Banner" should make it more obvious that any environment property can be used [#29935](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29935)
- Update javadoc to reflect move from WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter to SecurityFilterChain [#29902](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29902)
- Link directly to the Integration Properties section of the appendix when cross-referencing Kafka properties [#29808](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29808)
- Update documentation to reflect Hibernate's CamelCaseToUnderscoresNamingStrategy now being used by default [#29752](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29752)
- Add documentation for WebMvc.fn [#29729](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29729)
- Move appendix subsections under appendix section [#29690](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29690)
- In Gradle plugin docs, replace classifier (deprecated) with archiveClassifier in examples [#29686](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29686)
- Warn about the dangers of early bean initialization when using `@ConditionalOnExpression` [#29617](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29617)
- Rename Boxfuse to CloudCaptain [#29540](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29540)
- Upgrade version of gradle-git-properties in reference doc [#29538](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29538)
- Add Kotlin alternatives to Java samples [#29499](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29499)

name: v2.5.10
body:
## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Default JmxAutoConfiguration changes JConsole hierarchy for multi-property `@ManagedResource` object names [#29953](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29953)
- The active profiles log message is ambiguous when a profile's name contains a comma [#29896](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29896)
- Failed application contexts are not deregistered from SpringApplicationShutdownHook [#29874](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29874)
- Gradle Plugin triggers eager configuration of some tasks [#29762](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29762)
- MimeMapping for ots has a trailing space in its mime type [#29746](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29746)
- Dependency management for Liquibase does not include its liquibase-cdi module [#29676](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29676)
- Ignore invalid stream types when reading log update events [#29675](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29675)
- bootJar, bootRun, and bootWar do not pick up changes to the main source set's runtime classpath that are made after Boot's plugin has been applied [#29672](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29672)
- `@SpyBean` causes BeanCurrentlyInCreationException when there are circular references [#29639](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29639)
- server.tomcat.use-relative-redirects=true not honored when server.forward-headers-strategy=framework [#29333](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29333)
- A fat jar built with Gradle moves META-INF beneath BOOT-INF/classes while Maven leaves it at the jar's root [#28562](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28562)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- bootRun example should use mainClass, rather than main which was deprecated in Gradle 7.1 [#29965](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29965)
- Rectify incorrect sanitizing regex example provided in how-to docs [#29951](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29951)
- "Customizing the Banner" should make it more obvious that any environment property can be used [#29931](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29931)
- Update javadoc to reflect move from WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter to SecurityFilterChain [#29900](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29900)
- Link directly to the Integration Properties section of the appendix when cross-referencing Kafka properties [#29758](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29758)
- Add documentation for WebMvc.fn [#29683](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29683)
- Move appendix subsections under appendix section [#29667](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29667)
- In Gradle plugin docs, replace classifier (deprecated) with archiveClassifier in examples [#29611](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29611)
- Clarify relation of import path to resultant properties in configtree import data [#29606](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29606)
- Upgrade version of gradle-git-properties in reference doc [#29535](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29535)
- Rename Boxfuse to CloudCaptain [#29523](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29523)
- Provide some guidance on identifying and resolving Devtools classloading issues [#29438](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29438)
- Warn about the dangers of early bean initialization when using `@ConditionalOnExpression` [#29276](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/pull/29276)
- Document that placeholders in `@DefaultValue` annotations are not resolved [#23164](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/23164)

name: v3.0.0-M1
body:
## :star: New Features

- Switch to new coordinates for Git Commit ID Maven Plugin [#29515](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29515)
- Remove support for Hazelcast 3 [#29287](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/29287)
- Update Hibernate dependency management to use -jakarta artifacts [#28867](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28867)
- Drop support for Jersey until a Spring Framework 6-compatible jersey-spring module is available [#28808](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28808)
- Drop support for embedding EhCache 3 until it supports Jakarta EE 9 [#28800](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28800)
- Drop support for embedding Infinispan until it supports Jakarta EE 9 [#28799](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28799)
- Drop support for CommonsMultipartResolver as it has been removed in Spring Framework 6 [#28782](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28782)
- Drop support for REST Assured until it supports Jakarta EE 9 [#28722](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28722)
- Drop support for Jolokia until it supports Servlet 5 [#28704](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28704)
- Drop support for auto-configuring Hibernate metrics until a Jakarta EE 9 variant of hibernate-micrometer is available [#28703](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28703)
- Remove support for pooled-jms as it is not JMS 3.0 compatible [#28701](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28701)
- Remove dependency management for Apache Johnzon [#28616](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28616)
- Provide dependency management for Eclipse Yasson [#28614](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28614)
- Remove support for ActiveMQ [#28591](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28591)
- Remove support for H2 Console [#28590](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28590)
- Remove support for Atomikos [#28589](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28589)
- Remove support for Ehcache 2.x [#28588](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28588)
- Remove support for Java's deprecated SecurityManager [#28213](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28213)
- Raise the minimum supported version of Java to 17 [#28101](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28101)
- Raise the minimum supported version of Gradle to 7.3 [#28100](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/28100)
